name: As Above so Below UE5
description:
Unreal Engine 5

3dvirtualand_AsAbovesoBelow

This is a game about As Above so Below for Unreal Engine 5 for 2022 Epic MegaJam.

Landing Page:

https://itch.io/jam/2022-epic-megajam/rate/1686620

https://3dvirtualand.itch.io/as-above-so-below-ue5

https://www.3dvirtualand.com/asabovesobelow

Description

In a very mysterious canyon with bunkers there were darkness that finished with every one and now you get there to fight with remaining enemies.

How to play:

Controls

AWSD to move.

Left shift to Move with speed.

LMB to Fire.

RMB to Zoom.

Game Modes

Control Points

Look and control every control point intensely against enemies until your team win.

Elimination

Fight intensely with enemies until your team win.

Worry about Health?

Look for Heal.

Inventory?

Look for Weapons.

How to Exit and other Options?

Esc to open Menu.

Cheers!!!
